text:
(After seeing off Chiyoko, there's one meeting scheduled, and then
I need to prepare some documents once I get back to the office...)
Thank you, everyone, for your hard work!

Producer-san, good workâ€”
Oh, is something wrong...?

Oh, sorry, Chiyoko,
I was just thinking about the schedule after this.
If Chiyoko is working hard, then I have to work hard too!

Keep up the good work!
I'm cheering for you!

Haha, right!
That cheers me up, thank you.
